description.text1: Our community platform connects farmers, agricultural experts, and researchers from around the world. Share disease alerts, learn from others' experiences, and contribute to a global knowledge base that helps everyone protect their crops.
description.text2: By participating in our community, you're helping create early warning systems and best practices that benefit the entire agricultural community.

hero.title: About Krishi-Rakshak
hero.subtitle: Empowering farmers worldwide with cutting-edge AI technology to detect and manage crop diseases effectively.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Krishi-Rakshak is an advanced agricultural technology platform designed to revolutionize crop disease detection. We combine state-of-the-art artificial intelligence with deep agricultural expertise to provide farmers with accurate, instant, and actionable insights about their crops.
mission.vision: Our vision is to make advanced crop disease detection accessible to farmers everywhere, regardless of their location or technical expertise. We believe that technology should empower, not complicate, and that every farmer deserves access to tools that can help protect their livelihood.

accuracy.title: High Accuracy
accuracy.desc: Our AI models are trained on millions of crop images and continuously improved to achieve industry-leading accuracy rates.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.desc: Get instant results within seconds. No waiting, no delays - just fast, reliable disease detection when you need it most.

accessibility.title: Accessible Everywhere
accessibility.desc: Works on any device with an internet connection. Whether you're in the field or at home, Krishi-Rakshak is always at your fingertips.

community.title: Global Community
community.desc: Join a worldwide network of farmers sharing knowledge, alerts, and best practices for crop disease management.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: Constantly pushing the boundaries of AI and agricultural technology

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.desc: Giving farmers the tools they need to succeed

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: Committed to delivering the highest quality service

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.desc: Promoting sustainable farming practices for future generations

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.desc: Deep learning models trained on vast datasets to recognize disease patterns with exceptional accuracy.

cloud.title: Cloud Computing
cloud.desc: Scalable infrastructure ensures fast processing and reliable service, available 24/7.

mobile.title: Mobile-First Design
mobile.desc: Optimized for mobile devices, making it easy to use in the field with smartphones and tablets.

data.title: Data Security
data.desc: Your data is encrypted and secure. We take privacy seriously and never share your information without consent.

cta.title: Ready to Protect Your Crops?
cta.description: Join thousands of farmers who trust Krishi-Rakshak for accurate disease detection. Start your free account today.

hero.title: How It Works
hero.subtitle: Our advanced AI-powered platform makes crop disease detection simple, fast, and accurate. Follow these easy steps to get started.

capture.title: Capture a Clear Image
capture.desc: Take a high-quality photo of the affected crop area. Ensure good lighting and focus on the diseased leaves or plant parts.
capture.details: Use your smartphone or camera to capture clear images. Better image quality leads to more accurate detection results.

upload.title: Upload Your Image
upload.desc: Simply drag and drop your image or select it from your device. Our platform supports various image formats.
upload.details: The upload process is secure and encrypted. Your images are processed quickly and stored safely for your reference.

analyze.title: AI Analysis
analyze.desc: Our advanced AI model analyzes your image, comparing it against thousands of disease patterns in our database.
analyze.details: Using deep learning algorithms, we identify disease symptoms, assess severity, and provide confidence scores for each detection.

results.title: Get Instant Results
results.desc: Receive detailed diagnosis including disease name, severity level, confidence score, and treatment recommendations.
results.details: Our recommendations include organic and chemical treatment options, prevention tips, and best practices for disease management.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.desc: Get results in seconds, not hours or days.

easy.title: Easy to Use
easy.desc: Simple interface, no technical expertise required.

tracking.title: Track History
tracking.desc: Monitor your crop health over time with detection history.

tips.title: Tips for Best Results
tips.tip1: Take photos in natural daylight for best clarity
tips.tip2: Focus on affected areas, keeping the image sharp and in focus
tips.tip3: Include both close-up and wider shots when possible
tips.tip4: Avoid shadows and reflections that might obscure symptoms
tips.tip5: Capture images from multiple angles for comprehensive analysis

q1.question: How accurate is the detection?
q1.answer: Our AI models achieve over 95% accuracy in disease detection, and we continuously improve through machine learning.

q2.question: Is my data secure?
q2.answer: Yes, all images and data are encrypted and stored securely. We never share your information with third parties.

q3.question: Can I use this offline?
q3.answer: Currently, an internet connection is required for AI processing. We're working on offline capabilities for future updates.

q4.question: What crops are supported?
q4.answer: We support major crops including rice, wheat, corn, tomatoes, potatoes, and many more. Our database continues to expand.

cta.title: Start Detecting Diseases Today
cta.description: Join thousands of farmers protecting their crops with AI-powered disease detection. Get started in seconds.
